name: Super Hipster Lumberjack
description: You can't beat this game!!! Noah attempts to make a game for the first time. He then gets trapped in his own creation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Memory: 500 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 135 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is actually a funner game than I thought it would be. Here's a list of pros and cons!  Pros: -Simple and Fun game -Good level structure -A bit of challenge  Cons: -Some of the white blocks blend in with the back ground which makes it hard to see where to land or go. -Some of the parts of some levels take a longer time and get quite frustrating.  Other wise, this is a cheap and a fun game. Definitely worth your 50¢!  -Note to author  Congrats on your first game! It's great to see that a simple game like this that actually fun. I'd rather play this than some very buggy and broken game. Keep up with your good work!
This game looks amazing , and it's fun. My only problem is that if you hit esc / leave the game you lose all of your progress :/ but still watching pong while you don't know what to do is fun 10/10

This game has one BIG ISSUE.  The blending of colors and not being opposites. I am colorblind, and I was consistently confused with the textures in the game. This resulted in many deaths.  Not only that, but the terrible music which just loops every 30 seconds is very dull. Mute the game and listen to some YouTube video featuring any of Beethoven's music and you'll get the same thing.  Lastly, the platforming and gameplay is very dull. I found the gravity to be very uncomfortable.
A perfect balance between fun and unforgiveable difficulty
Gaming while in highschool - hard to beat!  Interesting game with a definite retro indie hipster feel.
Controls are too whacky and in general nothing interesting.

For a first time development project, this isn't bad. But at the risk of sounding like a jerk, I don't think it's good enough to sell, even at such a low price. Based on the Steam page I had been expecting a very basic platformer, but I was also hoping for a quirky sense of humour, some kind of story, an interesting gimmick or two, or at least some kind of art design to justify the title and to brighten up the blocks we're jumping over. There is some fun here - it's a good start and I look forward to what comes next - but I dont recommend this one. It feels very bare bones, more like a practice assignment than a finished product.  Pros- Addictive 'rage game' quality. Some fun level design.  Cons- Not very precise in its control or hitboxes, no story or style, backgrounds are mostly just coloured shapes, music is a collection of MIDI versions of classical tunes, no sound effects at all and very few animations (death for example is just an instant reset).
It would be a good game except everything is far too buggy. Floors aren't solid, platforms disappear. I would wait a few months, if not a year before all the bugs get squashed.
Pretty cool but save does not work. I got quite far and it does not load, so yeah, not recommended.
This game will make you mad. There is no saving until you complete level. Not recommened if you want your keyboard to not die.
Super Hipster Lumberjack is ony of my favorite games on steam. 8hrs so far and it´s fun...
Its so hard it makes me hard

A fantastic clash of platforming and graphical genius. I'd even go as far as to say that this game is better than super meat boy. The combination of polish really increased the gameplay better than mc donalds this game's polish.

My reaction to this is it's meh. I'd pick it up if you just wanted a cheap game to play around with for a little.   Pros + Cheap + Decent music  Cons - The jumping is really frustrating - I noticed stuttering a few times - The second you press escape all progress is lost
fun but checkpoints would be nice liike really nice
Spent 50 Cents, got ♥♥♥♥♥ by clown, listend to mozart while it happened.  11/10 -ign

This is all fun and games until you get to the spinny black ♥♥♥♥ section where you will get ♥♥♥♥ed 'pun intended' by the black wall of moving death, enjoy your $.50 game and $3 rope around your neck, as i say goodbye to this world.

If you are looking for a challenge this is one game that never gets old. its hard but it never feels mundane. i played this in a race with my friends and had a blast. I would say the best way to play this game is buy it for your self and a friend or two to race. The soundtrack is extremely calming and changes your anger to encouragement.
I asked for Hipster Lumberjacks that were hipster and super, and instead I get a puzzle game. Not amused.
i killed my mom worth it
This is small game very very simple, But this is the base of every big game a round the world !  (I love that soundtrack so classic!!!! )
I think this game is terrible. But it'll give you some fun for fifty cents.
FIRST IMPRESSIONS,  a fun platformer to pass some time but when its a white background it can be hard to see the platforms, and i sometimes fall through the world but its uncommon
It's good, but only worth a dollar or two.
If you have literally like nothing on your account and you like oldschool platforming games, this game is for you.
